bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Please update to a recent snapshot to gather s390x support - https://github.com/golang/sys/commit/33267e036fd93fcd26ea95b7bdaf2d8306cb743c
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): golang-github-golang-sys-0-0.4.git9c60d1c.fc25

$ gofed apidiff --compare-with upstream:github.com/golang/sys:9c60d1c508f5134d1ca726b4641db998f2523357 --reference upstream:github.com/golang/sys:33267e036fd93fcd26ea95b7bdaf2d8306cb743c -ruc ~unix: function updated: -function : results count changed: 1 -> 2 ~unix: function updated: -function : results count changed: 1 -> 0 ~unix: function updated: -function : parameter count changed: 2 -> 3 -unix: variable removed: SIOCDIPSECONFIG -unix: variable removed: SIOCLIPSECONFIG -unix: variable removed: SIOCFIPSECONFIG -unix: variable removed: SIOCSIPSECONFIG ~unix: type updated: -struct Ospeed: 'Pad_cgo_0' field removed ~unix: type updated: +struct Pad: new field 'X_padFd' ~windows: type updated: +struct dll: new field 'System'
Removed pieces should be easy to replace/patch in dependent projects.

s390x scratch build here: http://s390.koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=2306139
